nl.esciencecenter.neon.models

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.Model
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Axis, BezierLine, Box, GeoSphere, InvertedGeoSphere, LeftBottomQuad, Line, MultiColorText, Quad, ScatterPlot3D, SegmentedLine, Sphere, VisualGrid

    public abstract class Model
extends Object
    General extendible class representing a model with a VertexBufferObject.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Model.VertexFormat
      The OpenGL-internal vertex format rules the vertexes in the VertexBufferObject can follow.

      • draw

        public void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
        ShaderProgram program)
          throws UninitializedException
        Draw method for this model. Links its VertexBufferObject attributes and calls OpenGL DrawArrays.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.
        program - The shader program to be used for this drawing instance.
        Throws:
        UninitializedException
